metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25236 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: xmlparse.c in Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5 allows attackers to insertnamespace-separator characters into namespace URIs.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
